Skills.

Soft skills.

Empathic, creative, active listener, autodidact, fast learner, great collaborator, good communicator, hands-on, highly detailed and structured, highly adaptable, humour, problem solver, self-motivated, Stakholder management, authentic, strategic thinking.

Research.

User research & synthesis, user testing, usability testing, UX benchmarking, heuristic evaluation, competitive & comparative analysis, user interviews, field studies, competitive and comparative analysis.

Development.

HTML, CSS, JavaScript, WordPress.

Design.

Personas, user journeys, customer journeys, wireframes, rapid prototyping, low & high fidelity prototyping, storyboarding, lean UX, branding, logo design, style guides, illustration, user interface design, animation, video cut/compositing, typography, interaction design, iconography, imagery, print design, Flow charts, diagrams, Information architecture, brand & design system development.

Tools.

Sketch, Figma, Zeplin, Invision, Axure, Git, Visual Studio Code, Invison, Omnigraffle, LucidChart, Balsamiq, Adobe CC Suite.
